name: Mainstays Kids' Coordinated Bedding Set, Pink Horsey

reviews.name: Mainstays Kids' Coordinated Bedding Set, Pink Horsey
reviews.reviewText: I love this set. It just delivered about 10 minutes ago. To me the colors are bit brighter in real life than this picture (which I prefer). The pillowcase and sheets are a bright raspberry color. They look light in the pic (in my opinion). It's so cute. The sham is adorable with the big horsey on it. The material isn't the dull, matte fabric used in most less expensive sets. The sheets almost feel like they have a touch of polyester or satin in them. A step up from the cheap sheets usually included in sets. For the price you get a comforter, flat sheet, fitted sheet, pillowcase and sham. Best value and cutest design I've seen. I ordered "raspberry" colored curtains from walmart.com to go with and they match great.
reviews.title: Bright Colors and Fun Theme

reviews.name: Mainstays Kids' Coordinated Bedding Set, Pink Horsey
reviews.reviewText: First, the set is MUCH more vibrant in person. The pink is deeper than in the picture, it is a raspberry color. I bought this for my 5year old and it makes her room look absolutely beautiful. Its so whimsical. &the sheets are a great quality. The picture doesn't do it justice. Must buy
reviews.title: I love this set!

reviews.name: Mainstays Kids' Coordinated Bedding Set, Pink Horsey
reviews.reviewText: Purchased little pony and cupcake sets for six and four year old sweeties. Very good quality, vibrant colors and launders nicely. Fits really well on bunk beds!
reviews.title: Granddaughter surprise

reviews.name: Mainstays Kids' Coordinated Bedding Set, Pink Horsey
reviews.reviewText: My baby girl's room looks so beautiful. One-You can't beat the price. Two-It is very pretty and great quality. I still cant believe you get that many pieces for such a great price. I have seen similar beddings for $80 plus.
reviews.title: So Beautiful...

reviews.name: Mainstays Kids' Coordinated Bedding Set, Pink Horsey
reviews.reviewText: ordered this bedset for my 3 year old, expecting it to be okay for her but not wanting to put a lot of money into it yet. This is a very vibrantly colored set, brighter than picture. The feel of it is what surprised me, it's very soft and sheets are almost silky. Great quality!
reviews.title: Surprised!
